name: lmdb
author: Kris Zyp
description: Simple, efficient, scalable, high-performance LMDB interface

scripts.before-publish: rollup -c && prebuildify-ci download && prebuildify --target 16.14.0 && prebuildify --target 14.19.1 && prebuildify --target 17.9.0 && prebuildify --target 18.0.0 && set ENABLE_V8_FUNCTIONS=false&& prebuildify --napi --optional-packages --target 16.14.0 && node util/set-optional-deps.cjs && npm run test
scripts.prebuild-libc-expanded: prebuildify --tag-libc --target 16.14.0 && prebuildify --tag-libc --target 14.19.1 && prebuildify --tag-libc --target 17.9.0 && prebuildify --tag-libc --target 18.0.0 && ENABLE_V8_FUNCTIONS=false prebuildify --tag-libc --napi --optional-packages --target 16.14.0
scripts.prepublishOnly: cd prebuilds/win32-x64 && npm publish --otp %OTP% && cd ../darwin-x64 && npm publish --otp %OTP% && cd ../darwin-arm64 && npm publish --otp %OTP% && cd ../linux-x64 && npm publish --otp %OTP% && cd ../linux-arm64 && npm publish --otp %OTP%  && cd ../linux-arm && npm publish --otp %OTP% && cd ../..
scripts.recompile: node-gyp clean && node-gyp configure && node-gyp build
